original: Bärnheim, Nils Olof, häradshövding. Vara, f. 24/10/94 i Skepparslöv, Krist. 1. G. 28 m. Gertrud Berglö-f. Barn: Rolf f. 29, Bo 34, Björn 39. — Jur. kand. i Lund 19. E. o. assessor i Svea hovr. 26, v. här :hövd. 28, vattenrätts-sekr. i Österbygdens vattendomstol 35, här :hövd. i Ase, Viste, Barne o. Laske doms. (Vara) sed. 38. Ordf. i styr. f. Skarab. Ensk. Banks avd:kont. i Vara 42. RNO.
translated: Bärnheim, Nils Olof, district judge. Vara, born 24/10/94 in Skepparslöv, Krist. Married 28 to Gertrud Berglö. Children: Rolf born 29, Bo born 34, Björn born 39. — Graduated with a law degree from Lund University in 1919. Assistant judge in Svea Court of Appeal in 1926, deputy district judge in 1928, water rights secretary in Österbygdens water court in 1935, district judge in Ase, Viste, Barne and Laske districts (Vara) since 1938. Chairman of the board of the Skaraborg County Private Bank branch in Vara since 1942. Awarded with the Royal Order of the North Star.

hiringOrganization.name: Ase, Viste, Barne and Laske districts

awards.name: Royal Order of the North Star
